fixes.name: Max Date
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau LOD {MAX([Order Date])} into a DAX measure using MAX on the Order Date column.
fixes.type_changed_reason: This calculation uses aggregation (MAX), so it should be created as a measure.

fixes.name: First Date Pre Month
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR MaxDate = 'Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Max Date]
VAR PrevDate = EDATE(MaxDate, -1)
RETURN DATE(YEAR(PrevDate), MONTH(PrevDate), 1)
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated DATE(DATETRUNC('month', DATEADD('month', -1, [Max Date]))) by shifting Max Date back one month with EDATE and then returning the first day of that month using DATE(YEAR(...), MONTH(...), 1). References the Max Date measure.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references an aggregated field [Max Date], so it must be a measure.
